name: Lovely Feathers
summary: Lovely Feathers is an application that gives people the opportuninity to spread kindness through the act of passing a card (feather) containing a kind message. A card is referred to as a feather throughout the application. This application is still in development as of March 20th 2021. Since 2020 was such a very difficult and negative year, I wanted to create an application that gives an opportunity to provide people with a unique form of positivity.
notes: Each feather contains a unique message and prompt.
acknowledgements: Thank you to everyone who created feather!
Thank you to everyone who participated in this project!
